Older WiP

So.. as I mentioned on IRC, I've had a more complete patch for this for awhile. And I really should have attached it here, sorry :\

It's missing tests, and it's missing updated graphics (which I had from shorlander, but I think the mockups have since changed again). And the idea of breadcrumbs themselves is missing some direction, since it's not clear on whether they're wanted/needed, or exactly how they should behave (eg, should all in-content UI have a common "Firefox" root element or not?).

Not sure how cleanly this patch will apply, it's been awhile since I looked at it.
